title: Pomodoro Sprint
text: Work 25m, rest 5m. Repeat 4x, then a longer break.

title: One Thing First
text: Pick one must-do task each morning and finish it first.

title: Walk It Out
text: A 5–10 minute walk between tasks resets your brain.

title: Tidy Desk
text: Clear your desk at day’s end to lower tomorrow’s friction.

title: Deep Work Block
text: Silence notifications for a 60–90 minute focus block.
